The attacking creature can only push the opponent in a straight line, and the opponent can’t 이동 closer to the attacking creature than the square it started in. If an obstacle prevents the completion of the opponent의 이동, the opponent and the obstacle each take 1d6 points of 피해, and the opponent stops in the space adjacent to the obstacle.

유사주문 능력 강화 [일반]

EMPOWER 유사주문 ABILITY  [GENERAL]

공중 공격 [일반]

FLYBY ATTACK  [GENERAL]

전제조건: 비행 속도.

이익: When flying, the creature can take a 이동 action (including a dive) and another standard action at any point during 이동. The creature cannot take a second 이동 action during a round when it makes a 공중 공격.

호버링 [일반]

HOVER  [GENERAL]

전제조건: 비행 속도.

이익: When flying, the creature can halt its forward motion and 호버링 in place as a 이동 action. It can then 비행 in any direction, including straight down or straight up, at half 속도, regardless of its maneuverability.

If a creature begins its turn hovering, it can 호버링 in place for the turn and take a full-round action. A hovering creature cannot make wing 공격, but it can 공격 with all other limbs and appendages it could use in a 전력 공격. The creature can instead use a 브레스 무기 or 주문 시전 instead of making physical 공격, if it could normally do so.

If a creature of Large size or larger 호버링 within 20 feet of the ground in an 범위 with lots of loose debris, the draft from its wings creates a hemispherical cloud with a radius of 60 feet. 바람 so generated can snuff torches, small campfires, exposed lanterns, and other small, open flames of non-magical origin. Clear 시야 within the cloud is limited to 10 feet. Creatures have 은폐 at 15 to 20 feet (20% miss chance). At 25 feet or more, creatures have total 은폐(50% miss chance, and opponents cannot use sight to locate the creature).

일반: Without this feat, a creature must keep moving while flying unless it has perfect maneuverability.

향상된 고유 갑옷 [일반]

전제조건: 자연 갑옷, Con 13.

IMPROVED NATURAL ATTACK  [GENERAL]

빠른 유사주문 능력 [일반]

QUICKEN 유사주문 ABILITY  [GENERAL]

전제조건: 유사주문 ability at 시전자 레벨 10th or higher.

이익: Choose one of the creature의 유사주문 능력, subject to the restrictions described below. The creature can use that ability as a quickened 유사주문 ability three times per day (or less, if the ability is normally usable only once or twice per day).

Using a quickened 유사주문 ability is a free action that does not provoke an 공격 of opportunity. The creature can 공연 another action—including the use of another 유사주문 ability—in the same round that it uses a quickened 유사주문 ability. The creature may use only one quickened 유사주문 ability per round.

The creature can only select a 유사주문 ability duplicating a spell with a 레벨 less than or equal to half its 시전자 레벨(round down) –4. For a summary, see the table below.

잡아채기 [일반]

SNATCH  [GENERAL]

전제조건: Size Huge or larger.

이익: The creature can choose to start a 드잡이 when it hits with a claw or bite 공격, as though it had the improved grab special 공격. If the creature gets a hold on a creature three or more sizes smaller, it squeezes each round for automatic bite or claw 피해. A snatched opponent held in the creature의 mouth is not allowed a Reflex save against the creature의 브레스 무기, if it has one.

The creature can drop a creature it has snatched as a free action or use a standard action to fling it aside. A flung creature travels 1d6 x 10 feet, and takes 1d6 points of 피해 per 10 feet traveled. If the creature flings a snatched opponent while flying, the opponent takes this amount or 낙하 피해, whichever is 상급.

급회전 기동 [일반]

WINGOVER  [GENERAL]

전제조건: 비행 속도.

이익: A flying creature with this feat can change direction quickly once each round as a free action. This feat allows it to turn up to 180 degrees regardless of its maneuverability, in addition to any other turns it is normally allowed. A creature cannot gain altitude during a round when it executes a 급회전 기동, but it can dive.

The change of direction consumes 10 feet of flying 이동.
